Clear.Label: clear
Clear.Description: A clear day. No penalties or modifiers.

Fog.Label: fog
Fog.Description: Fog reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons.

Rain.Label: rain
Rain.Description: Rain reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down.

DryThunderstorm.Label: dry thunderstorm
DryThunderstorm.Description: Dry thunderstorms are dangerous because the lightning can start fires and there is no rain to put them out.

RainyThunderstorm.Label: rainy thunderstorm
RainyThunderstorm.Description: The lightning will start fires, but the rain will put it out. The rain also reduces movement speed and shooting accuracy.

SnowHard.Label: hard snow
SnowHard.Description: Snow reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down.

SnowGentle.Label: gentle snow
SnowGentle.Description: Snow reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down.

BloodRain.Label: blood rain
BloodRain.Description: Anyone exposed to the blood rain for long enough will be driven into a berserk rage. Certain traits and psychic sensitivity influence the berserk effect. Anomaly

ToxRain.Label: tox rain
ToxRain.Description: Tox rain makes creatures sick with toxic buildup. It also reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down. Odyssey

Sandstorm.Label: sandstorm
Sandstorm.Description: Sandstorms reduce the accuracy of ranged weapons, slow people down, and get sand everywhere. Odyssey

BlindFog.Label: blind fog
BlindFog.Description: A heavy fog that reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, as well as their maximum range. Odyssey

Overcast.Label: overcast
Overcast.Description: Thick clouds obscure the sky, reducing light levels. Odyssey

Blizzard.Label: blizzard
Blizzard.Description: Snow reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down. Odyssey

TorrentialRain.Label: torrential rain
TorrentialRain.Description: Torrential rain causes flooding. It also reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down. Odyssey

VPE_Hurricane.Label: hurricane
VPE_Hurricane.Description: Extreme wind will cause a slowdown to everyone not under the roof. Vanilla Psycasts Expanded

TM_HealingRainWD.Label: healing rain
TM_HealingRainWD.Description: A gentle rain with healing properties. Any creature exposed to healing rain will slowly regenerate their wounds. A RimWorld of Magic

TM_HailstormWD.Label: hail storm
TM_HailstormWD.Description: A fierce hailstorm that sheets swathes of land in deadly waves of ice. Movement and accuracy are severely hampered. A RimWorld of Magic

VPE_RadioactiveFog.Label: radioactive fog
VPE_RadioactiveFog.Description: A Nuclear reactor's meltdown has freed a cloud of radioactive material. This fog will hinder ranged attacks until it dissipates. Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Power

DeltaStreamSTNL.Label: Delta Stream
DeltaStreamSTNL.Description: A large tornado in the sky, strong enough to overpower other weather conditions, wind speed is increased massively. VPE - Aeromancer

TorrentialRainSTNL.Label: torrential rain
TorrentialRainSTNL.Description: Torrential rain causes flooding. It also reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down. VPE - Hydromancer

VCE_FestiveSnow.Label: festive snow
VCE_FestiveSnow.Description: Festive snow lifts the spirits of everyone around. Like regular snow, it reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down. Vanilla Christmas Expanded

VPEH_Bloodstorm.Label: bloodstorm
VPEH_Bloodstorm.Description: Mystical downpour of blood, caused by forbidden hemosage psycast. While non-hemogenic individuals are choking on blood, sanguophages regenerate hemogen and can cast psycasts without worrying about psychic heat. Vanilla Psycasts Expanded - Hemosage

VREA_PsychicStorm.Label: psychic storm
VREA_PsychicStorm.Description: Psychic storm is a supernatural phenomena that occurs during the periods of increased psychic activity. Vanilla Races Expanded - Archon

AB_RedFog.Label: red fog
AB_RedFog.Description: Red fog reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons. Alpha Biomes

AB_VolcanicAsh.Label: volcanic ash
AB_VolcanicAsh.Description: A mixture of rock, mineral, and glass particles expelled from a volcano during a volcanic eruption. This creates a thick atmospheric layer that reduces ranged accuracy. Alpha Biomes

AB_VolcanicAshRain.Label: volcanic ash with rain
AB_VolcanicAshRain.Description: A mixture of rock, mineral, and glass particles expelled from a volcano during a volcanic eruption, precipitating with rain. This creates a thick atmospheric layer that reduces ranged accuracy. Alpha Biomes

AB_ForsakenNight.Label: forsaken fog
AB_ForsakenNight.Description: A preternatural darkness that seeps into your very soul. Even during the "day" brightness will be very low, so lighting is going to be absolutely essential. Nights are going to be REALLY dark. Alpha Biomes

AB_ForsakenRainyNight.Label: forsaken rain
AB_ForsakenRainyNight.Description: A preternatural darkness that seeps into your very soul. A freezing rain of supercooled water has started to drop from the darkened sky. Alpha Biomes

AB_ForsakenThunderstorm.Label: forsaken thunderstorm
AB_ForsakenThunderstorm.Description: A preternatural darkness that seeps into your very soul. Now with a dry thunderstorm! Isn't it great? Alpha Biomes

AB_AcidRainWeather.Label: acid rain
AB_AcidRainWeather.Description: Toxic gas emissions from nearby volcanically active calderas are precipitating in the form of dangerous acid rain. Acid rain has an adverse impact on flora and fauna, killing insect and aquatic life-forms as well as having impacts on human health. Acid rain reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down. Alpha Biomes

AB_PetalStorms.Label: petal storm
AB_PetalStorms.Description: A flurry of flower petals that improves mood but reduces visibility. Alpha Biomes

AB_ForsakenNight_Alternate.Label: forsaken fog
AB_ForsakenNight_Alternate.Description: A preternatural darkness that seeps into your very soul. Even during the "day" brightness will be very low, so lighting is going to be absolutely essential. Nights are going to be REALLY dark. Alpha Biomes

AB_ForsakenRainyNight_Alternate.Label: forsaken rain
AB_ForsakenRainyNight_Alternate.Description: A preternatural darkness that seeps into your very soul. A freezing rain of supercooled water has started to drop from the darkened sky. Alpha Biomes

AB_ForsakenThunderstorm_Alternate.Label: forsaken thunderstorm
AB_ForsakenThunderstorm_Alternate.Description: A preternatural darkness that seeps into your very soul. Now with a dry thunderstorm! Isn't it great? Alpha Biomes
